messages.subject: Re: beliefs
messages.msgSnippet: This thread about beliefs prompts me to remind you all about the posting policies. In particular, please remember that this list is FOR the purpose of critical
messages.messageBody:
This thread about beliefs prompts me to remind you all about the
posting policies. In particular, please remember that this list is FOR
the purpose of critical thinking, analyzing, and examining our ideas.
That is why the posting policies include these:

2 Expect your beliefs to be challenged. Welcome this as an opportunity
to
critically examine your own ideas.

4. If you have a belief or practice that you don't want held up to
public
examination, don't post it to the list.

To read all the posting policies, go to the files area of this
yahoogroups list. They were posted here a couple of weeks ago and are
automatically sent to all new subscribers.

-pam
